meta.name: generator
meta.content: HTML Tidy for Windows (vers 14 February 2006), see www.w3.org

div.p: Jtest is an automated Java testing and static code analysis product that is made by Parasoft. It aims to improve Java code reliability, functionality, security, performance, and maintainability.
@PLUGIN_KEY@ plugin calls the Jtest tool via command line and passes the user-provided parameters.

ElectricFlow itself provides some advantages like parameters checking, easy functionality selection using only check boxes or radio buttons, hitorical log reports, procedure duration statistics, simple credentials attachment, real time analysis of the log been generated, among others.
This plugin was developed and tested against Jtest version 9.0.
IMPORTANT: In the ElectricFlow UI, from the Home page, open the Main Menu, and click Admin > Plugins to open the Plugin Manager.
IMPORTANT: For all parameter descriptions below, required parameters are shown in bold italics.

This procedure allows the input of all necessary parameters along with some extra of them to make the it more configurable. When the parameters are defined the Jtest command is created and run into ElectricFlow, displaying at the end the result(s) of it. It also creates a log file, which contains the output generated by the console.

tr.td: Indicate the directory where the jtest file resides. (Required)
Select the extension of the jtest file that will be executed: gtp, ctp, or ptp.
Provide the name of the jtest file to be executed. (Required)
Provide the path of the report in a specified file type xml, ascii or html.
Indicate the directory to use as the RuleWizard rules directory.
Provide any additional options for the jtest command.

ul.li: Procedure name(s) were changed in the step picker section
